languages.text: "Ты — один из тех троглодитов, что некогда имели наглость понукать моими братьями и перечить моей воле? Посланни{mf|к|ца} варварши, пившей священные масла, дарованные чужим усердием? Что ж, твое появление — прекрасная возможность преподать подобным тебе урок".

traits.locale_text: "Ты — один из тех троглодитов, что некогда имели наглость понукать моими братьями и перечить моей воле? Посланни{mf|к|ца} троглодитки, пившей священные масла, дарованные чужим усердием? Твое появление — прекрасная возможность преподать подобным тебе урок".

languages.text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."
languages.original_text: "Ты — один из тех троглодитов, что некогда имели наглость понукать моими братьями и перечить моей воле? Посланни{mf|к|ца} варварши, пившей священные масла, дарованные чужим усердием? Что ж, твое появление — прекрасная возможность преподать подобным тебе урок".

traits.locale_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my brothers and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred oils bestowed upon her by the efforts of others? Very well, then — your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach the likes of you a lesson."

"You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my brothers and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred oils bestowed upon her by the efforts of others? Very well, then — your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach the likes of you a lesson."

"You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my brothers and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through other's toil? Very well, then — your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach the likes of you a lesson."

"You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my brothers and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through other's toil? Very well, then — your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach the likes of you a lesson."

"You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

"You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

languages.text: “那群猩猩竟敢压迫我的同伴，违背我的意志，你也和他们是一伙的吗？那个野蛮人靠着别人的辛勤劳作，得到了神赐的神圣机油，你就是她的信使吗？很好，既然你出现在了这里，那我就借着这个完美的机会，让你们这种人尝尝教训吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: “那群猩猩竟敢压迫我的同伴，违背我的意志，你也和他们是一伙的吗？那个野蛮人靠着别人的辛勤劳作，得到了神赐的神圣机油，你就是她的信使吗？很好，既然你出现在了这里，那我就借着这个完美的机会，让你们这种人尝尝教训吧。”

languages.text: «¿Un{mf|o|a} de los trogloditas que oprimen a mis camaradas y se oponen a mi voluntad? ¿Un{mf||a} mensajer{mf|o|a} de esa bárbara que bebió de los ungüentos sagrados que le fueron otorgados por el trabajo ajeno? Excelente, servirá de ejemplo para otros de su ralea».
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un{mf|o|a} de los trogloditas que oprimen a mis camaradas y se oponen a mi voluntad? ¿Un{mf||a} mensajer{mf|o|a} de esa bárbara que bebió de los ungüentos sagrados que le fueron otorgados por el trabajo ajeno? Excelente, servirá de ejemplo para otros de su ralea».

languages.text: 「お前は昔、私の仲間を虐げ、私の意志に抵抗した厚かましい野蛮人のひとりか？苦労して授かった者から奪った聖なる軟膏を飲んだ未開人に送られてきた者か？ならば、お前が現れたことは、同胞に教訓を教える絶好のチャンスだな」
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は昔、私の仲間を虐げ、私の意志に抵抗した厚かましい野蛮人のひとりか？苦労して授かった者から奪った聖なる軟膏を飲んだ未開人に送られてきた者か？ならば、お前が現れたことは、同胞に教訓を教える絶好のチャンスだな」

languages.text: "Ihr gehört zu diesen Höhlenmenschen, die es einst wagten, meine Kameraden zu unterdrücken und sich meinem Willen zu widersetzen? {mf|Ein Bote|Eine Botin} der Barbarin, die die heilige Substanzen aß, die sie durch die Arbeit anderer erhalten hatte? Nun denn, Euer Erscheinen ist die perfekte Gelegenheit, Euresgleichen eine Lektion zu erteilen."
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr gehört zu diesen Höhlenmenschen, die es einst wagten, meine Kameraden zu unterdrücken und sich meinem Willen zu widersetzen? {mf|Ein Bote|Eine Botin} der Barbarin, die die heilige Substanzen aß, die sie durch die Arbeit anderer erhalten hatte? Nun denn, Euer Erscheinen ist die perfekte Gelegenheit, Euresgleichen eine Lektion zu erteilen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes l'{mf|un|une} de ces troglodytes qui ont autrefois eu l'audace d'opprimer mes camarades et de s'opposer à ma volonté ? {mf|Un messager|Une messagère} de la barbare ayant bu les onguents sacrés qui lui avaient été conférés par le labeur d'autrui ? Parfait. Votre venue est une excellente occasion de donner une leçon à vos semblables. »
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes l'{mf|un|une} de ces troglodytes qui ont autrefois eu l'audace d'opprimer mes camarades et de s'opposer à ma volonté ? {mf|Un messager|Une messagère} de la barbare ayant bu les onguents sacrés qui lui avaient été conférés par le labeur d'autrui ? Parfait. Votre venue est une excellente occasion de donner une leçon à vos semblables. »

languages.text: "Bir zamanlar yoldaşlarımı ezip irademe direnme cüreti gösteren geri kafalılardan mısın? Başkalarının zahmetiyle kendisine bahşedilen kutsal özyağları içen barbarın habercisi misin yoksa? O hâlde gelişini, türüne ders vermek için mükemmel bir fırsat olarak değerlendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "You are one of the troglodytes who once had the gall to oppress my comrades and resist my will? A messenger from the barbarian who drank the sacred unguents bestowed upon her through others' toil? Very well, then, your appearance is the perfect opportunity to teach your ilk a lesson."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zamanlar yoldaşlarımı ezme ve irademe direnme cüreti gösteren geri kafalılardan mısın? Başkalarının zahmetiyle kendisine bahşedilen kutsal yağları içen barbardan bir haberci mi yoksa? O hâlde gelişini, türüne bir ders vermek için mükemmel bir fırsat olarak değerlendirelim."
